segments.text: I notice the sunlight streaming in through that open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It casts a warm glow over the whole kitchen, almost inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I look at the puddle spreading out over the floor and feel a sinking sensation in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is blissfully unaware of the chaos brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water crashing over the edge of the sink like thunder?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! The boy is climbing dangerously high, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races as I think he might tip over any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire their determination, but what a risky game they’re playing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen should feel safe, but instead, it’s a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will it take for someone to notice the mess brewing here?
segments.speaker: PAR
